caption: Delicioso, muy único de su tipo y especial los platillos
Food and service is excellent!! If you can, get server Pablo he will give you the best recommendations!!

Wow, so delicious! Everything I had was absolutely great. Nice vibe, good service, abs delicious food & drinks. I would definitely recommend others and come back for sure. I had the tostones with shredded chicken, the pear pasta, and Miami drink, just yummy! The best part, I ate everything and didn’t feel that heavy full you get when eating heavy.
Great food. Great service.

On the pricey side, but very good! Staff is courteous and knowledgeable. They were busy when we were there but never felt the server or anyone else was in the weeds. We got 4 items to share and had to take food back with us because it was so much. Definitely would recommend.

Beyond excellent! Visiting town for a week on vacation and returned several times - - - that should  speak for itself. Cocktails are unique and all phenomenal (we tried most of them) and the food delicious. Decor and seating chic and comfortable. Flawless service. The only downside is they don't have a location where I live...
Excellent food to share in a very nice setting.

We dined at Reunion last night for dinner and this morning for brunch—excellent service and meals with both trips. For dinner, we tried the mahi-mahi ceviche, dozen oysters, duck prosciutto croquettes, filet mignon stroganoff, and seafood risotto. For brunch, we had a dozen oysters again, tuna tartare, seared salmon, Moroccan chicken, and chocolate chip pancakes with a bottomless mimosa. Everything was excellent. The service was really a stand-out. Our glasses were never empty, and there was never a moment of “where’s our waiter?” Excited to add RKB to the list of our regulars.

OMG, this place is amazing!!!  Pablo attended us and every detail.  We ordered all of his cocktail and food recommendations and we cannot wait to return.  The crispy rice appetizer and the Coconut Pistachio Mai Thai are a must...we coming back just for a couple of each of those.

Went last nite very disappointed in the food, Caesar salad lettuce was rusty, barely any dressing. The service was minimal at best. When the server was asked to hold the tomato & onion was told by the Manager they do not make changes to any dish, it is served the way it was described on the menu Only, no changes!! To top it off after we finished they took everything off the table - told us they had people waiting. The manager is not very nice, if he were my employee would fire him. The result of this episode is that after spending over $200, we will never go back again & will tell everyone how nasty we were treated.  BAD REVIEW!!!
Best steak I ever had!  Service is top notch.

(Translated by Google) A nice tapas place in Miami North beach, especially the attention of the waiters good!  (Original) Un sitio de tapas en Miami North beach agradable sobretodo la atención de los mesoneros good!
Pablo is a great server and very attentive. Loved his recommendation. Food was excellent. Will definitely came back!
Was okay. Happy hour was good. I just didn’t like that we weren’t served until like 15 minutes after we sat

This place is great. The drinks are tasty and not weak. My go to: The roasted cheese, Noodles with short rib, Papa's bravas, Dates wrapes in bacon, Tuna Tartar. Skip the eggplant parmesan, the expensive fish was kinda blase.  Did I mention the drinks! Catch happy hour and dive in. 🥰
quite delicious

Best dining experience! Staff remembered me from my first visit and treated me like a movie star! Food was amazing, favorites: honey sea bass, salmon, roasted cauliflower, crispy rice sashimi and almond delirious. Non-alcoholic drinks to try: ginger sage and pineapple cinnamon (very different but very delicious). Ambiance was modern/rich dark colors/velvet furniture and perfect for a date night. A hidden gem in Aventura!

Food was perfection, atmosphere was chic, service was exceptional!! Juan Pablo recommended all of his favorite dishes and nothing disappointed. He was so kind and attentive. We had the duck croquettes, crispy rice, pear focchi, smoked burrata. Literally everything was amazing!!!

Went here for brunch .  The plates are smaller (lunch / brunch sized )  I liked the ceviche a lot.  The citrus added to the raw meat definitely adds taste that somewhat covers the raw meat. The shrimp cocktail is as advertised.  The shrimp are larger tiger shrimp sized so that may not be good for some people who might want more gulf sized shrimp and more of them.  Anyway overall good lunch
Guy in grey t shirt standing on the bar doesn’t care about seats, asked couple times to change table for bigger, in the end he provided smallest one.
5-star tuna tartare! :) Great selection drinks to go along with it... Would definitely recommend and will surely be coming back in my next visit of the area.

Just had lunch and it was superb. Everything was so fresh and delicious, even our young boys loved the food (tagliatelle bolognese). The goat cheese on the beet salad was amazing and I highly recommend the lomo saltado. Holy lomo, it was soooo freaking good. Amazing cocktails, too. We will definitely be back!!!

Absolutely excellent experience. The best part was our server, Marisol who provided excellent service and the perfect recommendations. The food exceeded our standards with the best dish being the Pear Fiocchi. Highly recommend. Topped the night off with their back room lounge and had a great time.

You see this place with tables outside but they sit you inside even when you made a reservation. BE AWARE when the server comes to offer you still water, mineral which they all have in their hands, or "house" tap water. $8 DLLS FOR A FANCY BLUE BOTTLE.... No ice. A soda $4 DLLS. We were surprised by the prices and sizes, you come here to get a few small appetizers and share with your table, we were three, and each one wrongly ordered an appetizer (a small fondue with wood sticks, no the typical long forks $13 which is for 2 ppl, a salad not even for one person, each one got an entré, example a Salmon with nothing else on the plate $18 small pasta $16  plus you add a cocktail, (no less than $11 for 5 to 6oz) or a glass of wine recommended by the Chef $22-28 just 6oz. The food is great, the portions are small and prices are high! This is not the typical high end "cusine" the place is small and simple, with some modern touches. The service starts great with the water bottle and get orders then someone else from the bar comes to give the drinks and the same happens with the food. The Server came 3 times just to ask if everything was fine.  Worth to visit just one time.

Our waiter was Pablo, a Peruvian man, and he was amazing! We went in a group of 4 girls for the first time and everything he recommended was delicious. He was very attentive and sweet. Thank you Pablo! We’ll be back!

The menu is from a wide range of cuisines including Italian, Peruvian, Moroccan to name a few. The appetizers were very good and on the main courses when I go back I will skip the Bologenese, and the shirt ribs but definitely keep the beef Lomo.

Pablo was absolutely amazing along with the food and drinks! He made our experience fun, enjoyable and memorable. We got 6-8 dishes and enjoyed it thoroughly. Presentation, taste, service were all 5 stars. Thanks for making our first night in Miami everything we could've asked for and more!

I was initially hesitant to try this place out for a nice work dinner, solely because it's in a shopping plaza, and the outside dining tables are in the front, adjacent to the parking lot.  However, the quality of the well-curated menu was the salient feature of the restaurant, closely followed by the care and service we received (from Pablo, our server, as well as from conversation with the owner when he visited our table).  I have a general rule to not go to a restaurant twice, so I tend to order various dishes and drinks to get a good feel for a restaurant's brand.  Luckily, they have a tapas-style menu, and we two ordered about a dozen items (and also a few different cocktails and wines), to the extent at which Pablo paused me while I was ordering to suggest and begin moving us to a larger table (4- vs. 2-top).  Our reaction to each item varied between "this is really good" to "this is sublime" - our favorites being the tiradito, fiocchi, and cauliflower.  I would tag this restaurant as "elevated cool," with a team who continues to thrive in this economy, clearly due to their dedication to quality, hard work, and the customer experience.
Their Peruvian infusion was almost unexplainable... absolutely loved everything I had... can wait to go back and explore the menu more as I only scratched the surface. Wow!
Love this place.   Theres truffle in the Wiskey!!!

Just went there and the place was empty and when i say empty theres 30-40 empty tables i sit down with my family and kids and after 10 mins waiting the manager comes and tells me that theres a reservation for this table lmao noone was there and the place was empty lol not worth your time or business!!!! Manager was rude and deff not hospitable
First but definitely not last time here! The food and drinks are extremely enjoyable, and Pablo helps tie everything together...if he tells you that you ordered a lot, listen to him!

Pleasantly surprised by the wide variety of options on the menu. From raw items like ceviche to sweet items like almond pancakes with chocolate chips, to even lomo saltado in the meat section, it is very easy to find something for everyone. We really enjoyed the naan, and the oysters, but the mediterranean chicken with couscous reminded us of a bland arroz con pollo. Unfortunately, they did not have the passionfruit tiramisu which was what drew us to the restaurant to begin with. Perhaps we will be back to try it. The ricotta cheesecake was crumbly- not creamy- and overall pretty forgettable.  What fell short was the service. We kept having to flag down the server to order more food, refill our water glasses, order dessert, get the check, etc. I suspect it had to do with the fact that we were not there for a boozy brunch because when we told the server we would not be ordering drinks he did not hide his disappointment very well. I am practicing dry January and just wanted to have a relaxing sunday brunch with my dad... theres no shame in that 😒.
Phenomenal! Awesome food, incredible service and wonderful atmosphere. I actually find it quite difficult to find solid restaurants in Florida, but this one is a gem.
Amazing food and great service. Ask for Pablo he was awesome

I absolutely loved Reunion Kitchen & Bar. The ambiance was great with a nice romantic low light setting. The craft cocktails were delicious. I got the Ginger Margarita and it was so good. I wasn’t too hungry when I arrived, but I wish I was so I could have ordered more dishes. But we ordered the duck prosciutto croquettes, the ahi tuna tartar, and the crispy tostones. Everything was delicious and the service was great! Will definitely be returning because I was eyeing the mushroom risotto!
Excellent! Best place and food in Aventura. Thanks Pablo for the A+ service and suggestions.

A Wynwood type gem located in Aventura, how wonderful! Super creative cocktails, and sharing plates perfect for dates or with a group. The food was amazing and our waiter Pablo had such a great personality that he felt like our friend. We asked him to recommend his faves and they were spot on! If you make a reservation try to ask for Pablo, he serves the outside area.

First time but definitely will not be our last!! Food was delicious, lots of options to choose from, Italian, Peruvian, Greek, meats, pastas, fish and seafood there is definitely something for everyone!! Our waiter Juan Pablo was great very knowledgeable and gave delicious recommendations! It’s a little pricey but you definitely get what you pay for!!
Great food and a fun and tasty menu. Excellent costumer service as well. Come check it out!
Once again my goto place in Aventura. Great food, great drinks, great staff and now they have a lounge!
Great food
Awesome place! Live nearby and i wanted to know this place and i was amazed with the food quality they served! Highly recommend the meat stroganoff

It was amazing the first time we went here and that's why I gave two stars. The second time we went, despite being the amazing BLACK people we are, we didn't receive the same service the caucasian patrons at the next table received so will not be returning. Sorry, not sorry.
(Translated by Google) Nice place. We had a well-attended lunch and good food.  (Original) Lugar agradable. Almorzamos bien atendidos y la comida buena.

A great place for all types of food and drinks!! Whether it's greek style octopus or peruvian style lomo saltado, the eclectic style and international food makes this one of a kind and such a warm and needed experience in Aventura!! ☺️☺️
Excellent Food!
Nice clean place when I stepped in the atmosphere was very beautiful the service was at their best very nice and pleasant I recommend anyone to go there again nice just great

Marvelous dining place, very gourmet with a menu filled with delicious and affordable options. From fondue to kale salad to hamachi tiradito, there are just too many delightful options in the menu to choose from. Our favorite restaurant in Aventura!!!
Pablo is AWESOME!
Incredible tapas! Had the tuna tartar and Chilean Sea bass and will be back for more.

Definitely hands-down one of the most spectacular eats in the Los Angeles area. There are many who try to imitate but don't even come close to this place. I might be biased because I've been here since I was a mere Youngin but if I were To recommend Persian Food to anyone it is between this please and another in Glendale that I choose not to name here. Best quality and most authentic Persian cuisine, don't skip this place, go hungry and bring friends.

5 stars+. Pablo was amazing. It was our first time here and he explained the entire concept to us and the food menu in detail which guided us to some delicious options. Food was amazing we had the octupus, short rib, and the scallops and they were all amazing & lets not forget the leave you wanting more drinks which included the mykonos mojito and     Coconut pistachio mai thai. Highly recommended. Thanks Pablo for the great experience.

Horrible customer service. Ordered online and waited 40 minutes. Later we were told our order “can’t be made” because their “system is broken”. Also said they no longer have any spots for us to order even though we have been waiting for 40 mins.

ordered online from their website. waited THIRTY FIVE minutes until later they finally answered our phone calls. then an employee, Viktor, said they can’t make our food anymore because their “system is broken”. Viktor said he no longer has a spot for us to order. horrible customer service. not coming back again.

Reunion is the best tasting food in the north Miami Beach area. It’s tapas and new American style. The drinks are amazing they are true mixology.  This place is known for its service, food presentation and taste. The actual location is in a parking lot but if you want great tasting food you have to come here.  They will accommodate large groups of people and their service is impeccable.

(Translated by Google) Excellent food, I enjoyed everything thanks to Pablo the waiter who indicated me very well.  (Original) Excelente comida disfrute todo gracias a Pablo el mesero que me indico muy bien.

I loved how they followed all protocols to make us feel safe.  The staffers were really nice. The meals were tasty and the portions were really big for a medium sized.  I will definitely go back there.

Quick takeout pick up.  I notice a small-ish terrace for outdoor dining, when I arrive, and it's a nice accommodation with simple, compact tables and plants. Chic. The terrace is full on a Saturday night, btw, but service seems to move quickly.   I ordered seafood risotto.  It was full of flavor. It was packed in sustainable packaging and still hot when I arrived home, 10 miles later. Phenomenal!

Our first time dining at Reunion, and we cannot give it enough praise. The staff was gracious and welcoming. We enjoyed a curated cocktail in the lounge prior to dinner. Sabrina was excellent behind the bar, and made us feel like we were a part of Reunion’s fabric. Dinner was set up outside for us. Socially distant. Clean, sanitized and safe. Marisol waited on us, and guided us through a lovely meal. Playful and inventive dishes that suit a diverse palate, and can accommodate many a dietary restriction. Wishing you guys all of the success and many years going forward!!
The food was amazing along with the waiter Juan Pablo! He suggested amazing dishes and made the whole experience even better. Food and drinks are fantastic!
good rib eye. good service. croquettes ,the best.
Good ambiance . Good service

We decided to come in and from the first walk we received AMAZING service. The dishes is tapas style but very big . Everything was delicious. We didn't like the cauliflower because it was not cooked enough so they took it from our bill. We are going back for sure .

So I saw this place open during the pandemic and it  looked poppin so I decided to check it out and it was amazing. Unique menu items and very generous portions. Inside looks like a art gallery. Plus our server Marisol was super helpful and nice!
Small portions. Unimpressive dishes. Overpriced

I went for my bday and i think it’s my new favorite spot! Ambiance friends appetizers main dish! Wow. Service was a 10 as well! I got the watermelon tiradito, roasted cauliflower, and mushroom risotto. I got Two drinks, the Japanese garden and another one  which was also delicious ! Parking is free, inside an open mall.
Beautiful place! Delicious food! Friendly staff! Will definitely come back!
Great place and better people

Went last night for dinner with my family and everything was awesome! Food and drinks were amazing and our server Sebastian was exceptional! He was very attentive and made sure our dinner experience was just excellent. Will definitely go back and recommend to more family and friends.
Best Tuna Tartar and cocktails! And Marisol is so nice and helpful! Definitely wanna come back to try more foods here!

My daughter and her family recently moved to the area and where looking for options...this place is awesome!!! We loved the cocktails, specially the Smoked Mule!!! Our waiters were Victor and Michael, very accommodating (we were with my one year old grandson) made suggestions and all were on point!!!Definitely will be a returning patron!!! Check it out for yourself, guaranteed you will not be disappointed!!!

One of the best dining experiences in town.  Everything I've ordered on the menu has been amazing and they have never let me down.  Their service and presentation is outstanding. Ricky our server was very attentive and so was all the other staff.  Highly recommended!
(Translated by Google) Excellent place, excellent attention  (Original) Excelente lugar, excelente atencion

(Translated by Google) Good menu and excellent attention from Arianella (I think she is called that) the Venezuelan.  (Original) Buen menú y excelente atención de Arianella ( creo q se llama así ) la venezolana.
The meals and service were beyond my expectations. We truly enjoyed the atmosphere of this place. Extraordinary spot to take the family out for lunch.
Everything we had was amazing especially the Limo Saltado. Although I wish it had the aji amarillo. You can tell everything is fresh and good quality. The cocktails are just as good as the food

PARTY OF 7- Here’s a newcomer’s review. My take on Reunion. The drinks were just the beginning of an incredible evening! Our table had rounds of drinks, rounds! Lol! The Old Fashion, Ginger Margarita, Coconut Mai Tai, and a few others were a hit!  Reunion Kitchen Bar was PHENOMENAL! With every dish, salads, seafood, meats, to the desert my family and I were extremely satisfied! The food was so tasty that we were discussing how good it was as we ate! And to think we were concerned that there wasn’t going to be enough food! Well...we took home some. Lol!  The staff were all wearing masks, the tables within 6 feet, and our waiter, Sebastian was perfection! We LOVED every moment.  Thank you Reunion for a memorable dinner. We will be back!
Great food and service
Pablo was excellent and the food was exceptional.

Pablo is a great waiter /server  I would definitely come back with more family and friends , he is very pleasant and friendly he is also excellent with great advices with food. 5 stars most definitely
This was my first time. I absolutely love. Pablo the server was excellent. Great customer service !
Delicious

The bartender was very imaginative with the cocktail creations. Lots of ginger was used in my Moscow Mule which made the drink even more refreshing. The appetizer and entrees were also creatively seasoned and flavorful. A very enjoyable experience without having to drive to SoBe.
We simply loved this place!!  And Pablo did an awesome job. Food and drinks high recommended.  We are definitely coming back!
The food and mixed here is the best in Aventura. Our waiter was Pablo and he was amazing. We got the crispy rice, steak and cauliflower. Everything was top shelf.
The drinks are amazing!! Food was good as well. Second time visiting and most definitely going back! Pablo was our waiter, he was very attentive and gave us some good recommendations.
Ricky was awesome! Drinks were phenomenal. Had the Ginger Margarita, Octopus, Moroccan Chicken and Naan bread pizza. Favorite is Naan Pizza and Margarita. Dishes were larger than tapas. will be back
Amazing in every way, the food is delicious, the ambience really nice, the service is great and the drinks are incredible. Definitely a must visit!

Went to Reunion last night had the pleasure of being served by Marisol and Mark. Graciously greeted by Marisol who amazingly accommodated is and mad some fabulous recommendations on the food. Mark hooked myself and my family with some delicious, and creative cocktails. I must say I’m very impressed will definitely be visiting again every time I’m in Miami.
Perfect taste
Beautiful menu. Great food.
Good food, but we had to wait for quite a bit even though we had reservations
Fernando (our waiter)? Fantastic. Cocktails? Delicious. Food? Superb. Visit here if you want to impress your girlfriend with fancy cocktails that meet the hype. Don’t sleep on this spot.

This place was amazing! Honestly we didnt expect much when we chose this place but from the moment we arrived the staff was so friendly, attentive, and explained the menu well. The food came out fast and was incredibly delicious. The drinks were also amazing and well presented. Overall the restaurant exceeded our expectations and for the food quality, service, and overall ambience, you cannot beat the price! I recommend this spot to EVERYONE. P.s. my fav dish was the Croquettes and fav drink was the Coconut Pistachio Mai Tai. *chefs kiss*
Amazinggggg place, delicious food focusing on detail and presentation. Friendly staff & owner was so sweet will absolutely be back soon!!
Amazing food,atmosphere, Pablo was a great server

This place was an amazing find.  Food was out of this world.  I highly recommend their Duck Croquetas and the octopus.  Really, all dishes were delicious.  Their Green Garden drink is perfect.  You just can’t get enough.  Highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great experience in dining and drinking.
Food and drinks were really good!

(Translated by Google) Excellent! Today's special is a Honey Miso Chilean Seabass ... to die for! And the attention of Pablo, my waiter who helped me choose the best of the day! Thanks ... I will go back!  (Original) Excelente! El especial de hoy es un Honey Miso Chilean Seabass...para morir! Y las atenciones de Pablo, mi mesero que me ayudo a escojer lo mejor del dia! Gracias...I will go back!

Amazing. Had lunch @Reunion today, & already planning to go back. The food quality & presentation were outstanding! The staff did an exceptional job keeping everything above and beyond clean, as well as offer outside seating. I needed all the good juju I received while dinning there. Well done✨
Is not allowed to get a drink at the bar. And menu is overpriced,:(

Review based on visit back in January:  Reunion Ktchn Bar is still fairly new in Aventura. It used to be where Salsa Fiesta once thrived in the same plaza as BurgerFi and Panera. I came here to check out their happy hour. The menu was limited but it didn't disappoint.  I started with Mezcal Caipirinha and Patatas Bravas. Both on HH and were less than $10. I love this cocktail. It's smoky and quite refreshing. The potato dish was flavorful. Still soft but had nice crunchy edges. Then I decided to move inside since the bartender Miguel insisted to make me a real smoked Old Fashioned. I was pretty impressed. It wasn't too sweet, not too bitter, just right. And I loved the fact that he actually smoked the glass for me. It makes a big difference. I also added Al Ajillo Portobello. This was very good too. Perfect with the Old Fashioned. Both were also $9 each on HH menu.  Overall, I had a really good 1st time experience and I actually ended up going back a couple of weeks after just for a cocktail. Although I haven't explored the entire menu, I think this place will attract folks looking for a superb tapas. It's a little hidden and 5-10 minutes from the mall but it's worth the detour.

Yes, yes, and yes! Loved everything. The food was amazing, loved all the options. The drinks were so well put together and delicious. Our service from Sebastian and Luis was phenomenal. We will be back!
Amazing food and drinks, great service. Love it
Awesome drinks, appetizers and service!

(Translated by Google) New option in Adventure. Modern ambience outside tables also very nice decor, very good service. Different and delicious varied menu. I highly recommend it.  (Original) Novo opção em Aventura. Ambiente moderno mesas externas também decoração muito bacana, atendimento muito bom. Cardápio bem variado diferente  e delicioso. Super recomendo.

It was ok ... all the hype n well I prob was more impressed by my cocktail and presentation than the actual food flavors. I did Like the cauliflower since the corn sauce was spicy . Fish was fresh but nothing to say Wow. Pear naan ... cheese n unsweetened pear was nothing special  . Okay I guess I was expecting a food addiction when I left but no where near it ..it was just nice food . Its more ambiance n drinks I’d recommend this place for I suppose . People were nice as well can’t complain .

(Translated by Google) I loved the concept of small plates to share. Everything I asked for was phenomenal. The chicken pastry, exquisite. I will be back  (Original) Me encanto el concepto de pequeños platos para compartir. Todo lo que pedí estuvo fenomenal. La pasatela de pollo, exquisita. Volveré
Wonderful atmosphere...great services...and awesome food ...highly recommended...plus the owners are the best...

It's a new gem. Tapas/large appetizer plates. Good to go as 4-5 people group, so you can share/sample more dishes. Their menu cocktails are interesting and good. Try this place and you won't be disappointed.
Great food and nice atmosphere. Very good service from Marisol.

(Translated by Google) I loved the restaurant, the impeccable service, the presentation of the food, Marisol the waitress. SPECTACULAR. And very good prices! 100% recommended 🙌🏻👌  (Original) Me encanto el restaurante, el servicio impecable, la presentacion de la comida, Marisol la mesera. ESPECTACULAR. Y Muy buenos los precios! 100 % recomendado 🙌🏻👌

Incredible.... Food, stellar, duck croquettes, pan seared salmon with fire corn sauce, Mediterranean chicken n cous cous, chicken flavorful, tender,  and unique use of boneless thighs.  Salmon just a hair overdone(for a chef) due to carryover cooking nothing worth complaining or lessening rating over, still perfection, well seasoned to my surprise and unique as well, croquettes of smoked duck well balanced with sweet fig jam and peppery arugula to cut richness, delicious. Im a professional chef myself, excellent work.  Drinks were phenominal and uniqe, well balanced, had brasil something and miami something house cocktails, really really good. Garnish was visually appealing as well as relevant to flavors profiled in drinks, very important detail to me.  Service was top notch, host made immediate eye contact, had reservation which allowed a choice of inside or outside seating, but humidity was low and temp was good so i opted to eat outside where less people were sitting. Our waitress, a shorter blonde woman, donnella? Dam, im sorry that forgot her name, started with a D, she wore glasses and was so detailed, friendly, engaging, attentive, un rushing, congenial, and knowledgeable of the menu, she is an asset to the restaurant.  Timing was good of drink app and course delivery. Ambiance was perfectly lit inside, clean dinning room, un cluttered,  nice art on walls, stylish chairs and tables, bar very chique, open line kitchen all kitchen staff looked and moved professionally, the food also reflected that.  Outside plants give a feel of separation from rest of shopping plaza, very nice outside furniture and ambiance as well.  Only critique i have is that i saw a waiter leaving the rest room as i entered still wearing his apron, im a professional chef in fine dinning,  that is a NO-NO in the industry. Aprons and hats off before entering restrooms.  Outside of that no complaints worthy of lessening their 5 star rating.  I highly recommend this establishment,  I will return to spend money and bring other guest, definitely a good place that says "miami" with over all experience.  Great place glad a co worker told me of it. Great staff, great food, great ambience and good location, dont want it to be downtown or on the beach.  I hope the owner gives a bonus to deserving staff 1x or 2x a yr when profits are good as most staff appears to be great(not just good) at their job, even the gentlemen that wore his apron in the bathroom was a good waiter on the floor.

Great ambiance.Great food. But very disappointed  cause when we ordered  our 2 drinks they came in heavy  glasses  wich both  of them were chipped and instead of really not only apologize  but take things  more seriously  they only didnt charged  us those 2 drinks and never gave us a real apologize or maybe aomething better like myabe offer a free drink or something  similar?I am upset cause till now I am not sure if I swallowed  some glass pieces and it may hurt me and really expected  a better apology  from manager!!2 drinks and both  glasses with dangerous chips!!!!!,Shame shame!!!!!
We love this place. A unique restaurant int he hart of Aventura!! Lomo Saltado, Waigyu sliders, Petit Fondue are my favorites. For desdert the churros are awesome!!!
Food and service was great
Cute place. Staff was pleasant. Food was ok, tapa style which quickly adds up.

Clean, chic, and comfortable. Mostly a cocktail bar with SMALL plates to share (2 slices of bread for a table of 4, now THATS SHARING). Good food, but appetizer sized portions at full ala carte entre pricing. Value is just not there, for what we spent, I can think of at least 5 other places in the area I would rather go to. (for example beef short rib and noodles is really chips of short rib meat with spaghetti in an appetizer sized portion, not a single short rib to be found. Tasted good, but twenty bucks? I'll pass.
Everything delicious, excellent service!!
This place is amazing.  An anomaly for Aventura. Fantastic food, drinks and even better service. Yum  x10 plus all the vibes.....🍽❤
Great service, food, drinks and ambiance! All around an awesome experience :)
Great place Luis is the best guy so friendly.
(Translated by Google) Excellent  (Original) Excelente

New place along biscayne. Found it via yelp. Excellent hand crafted cocktails, one with an actual frozen rose in it (rose negroni). Food also fantastic, different flavor palate that really pops. Will definitely be coming back to explore the menu a bit more!!
Great food. Great service !
Just got back from my second time there. The food is sooo good and the service impeccable! Great addition to Aventura!

I rarely give 5 stars but this place deserves it. It is a small and quaint type of place with excellent food and superb service. Every dish is delicately presented and the food is on point. We held our company holiday lunch there and it did not disappoint.  I strongly recommend the duck/prosciutto croquetas and the passion fruit tiramisu

I am a HUGE fan of reunion. Their gastronomic selection is by far the best in Aventura. All risottos are spectacular as well as (my husband’s favorite) the French Mussels. Every time I visit I find a new favorite. All their plates are so rich in flavor. Whilst I devour the great food, I drink my favorite cocktail, the Rose Negroni.
Great Tapas, fabulous drinks and perfect for get together with friends and family!!

From the decor to the service to the food it was an awesome experience.  Tapas menu. Everything we ordered was phenomenal.  Sliders, calamari, tuna tartare, falafel tacos. We'll definitely be back again.
Excellent service, especially Marisol (Server) friendly and personable, I recommend this place 100% !!
Great Service and the food was amazing!

(Translated by Google) The place is exaggeratedly expensive for the dishes they serve, a $ 18 tenderloin with french fries and white rice, it is sauteed with onions but in reality it should be called an onion with tenderloin because the meat doesn't even turn out.  A dish like this anywhere else could be around $ 7 or $ 8. The rest is the same dishes!  (Original) El lugar es exageramente caro para los platos que sirven, un lomo 18$ con papas fritas y arroz blanco, viene salteado con cebolla pero en realidad debería llamarse un cebolla con lomo porque la carne ni la vez.  Una plato como este en cualquier otro lugar podría rondar los 7 u 8$ . El resto se los platos igual!

This place is a true hidden gem in the heart of Aventura!!! The drinks are great! The food is phenomenal, whether you are having tapas or an entree... And the customer service is really outstanding! I have come a couple of times before, and I've had a very good overall experience each time, however today Camila went above and beyond to go one step further on making of my dining experience an even more enjoyable one! Kudos to Reunion Ktchn Bar!!!
Great place, excellent food and amazing service. Marisol very good waitress.
Amazing ambience, excellent service and food quality. My new favorite place in the area.
Where everything is on point! The food. The service and the vibe. Truly remarkable! Every dish was amazing, including passion fruit desert.
Been here twice and the service is awesome and the food and drinks are 2nd to none. Bartender is very nice and helpful as well as very good with his margaritas. Definitely recommend this place.
Excellent food, service and ambience. A must needed place around NMB area
Amazing food, service and cocktails by Miguel.

Cesar is a phenomenal manager. He was extremely welcoming and he took the time to tell us about the establishment, the concept, the menu and the chef's background.  We also had a fantastic server with Luis. He made great recommendations and was very enthusiast. He was attentive to our needs and his anticipatory service was top notch!  We loved the food. 48 hour short rib, bacon wrapped dates, the octopus and the mussels were all outstanding.  Tasted like fresh tapas in Barcelona!  2 thumbs up.

Pricey but so good!! The tapas choices they provide are fun and tasty. Stay away from eggplant parmigiano. But everything else was spot on. Best was the duck priccuito and pear Fiocchi. Like my pics!! :) enjoy

It's probably the best place I've been in a very long time. The owners and staff are really pleasant and they make you feel like it's home. The food and drinks have amazing taste and presentation is mind blowing.
Incredible food and Service. My server Miguel was very courteous and on point! Highly recommend this place!
Amazing place right in the heart of Aventura! Outstanding service. Delicious food.

(Translated by Google) Spectacular food, good service and atmosphere. Definitely 100 percent recommended. Marisol you are the best! Thank you  (Original) Comida espectacular, Buen servicio y ambiente. Definitivamente 100 por ciento recomendado. Marisol  eres la mejor! Gracias
The staff was SO nice !! And the food was amazing for just randomly walking into the place !! Will be returning 100%!!!!
(Translated by Google) Highly qualified staff, excellent service, spectacular food!  (Original) Personal altamente calificado,excelente atención,comida espectacular!

The food and service here is spectacular. We had the chicken lettuce wraps, patatas bravas, short rib noodles, and the pork belly crepe. Our server, Barbara, was so amazing. She recommended some of the mixed soft drinks they have in the back of the menu and we tried the Kiwi Strawberry and the Hibiscus Lemonade. Both were very delicious.  I can't wait to come back and try the rest of the menu.
Great attention to detail with everything....decor, drinks, food, extras..... Miguel was amazing behind the bar!!!!
Exelente food! Exelente service! Clean and nice! Marisol was great and helpful its was our first time. Highly recommended! ! Thank you guys! We will visit you soon again!

I was just there with my mother and my husband for dinner and wow... What a hidden gem! The food is great (mostly tapas style), the cocktails are amazing, I loved the ambiance, and the customer service (Miguel took care of our table) is absolutely wonderful!... I just left and I am already planning to go back, and to share this spot with family and friends.

(Translated by Google) This place is perfect and I recommend them for happy tour, Miguel and Barbara are the best bartender in Aventura  (Original) Este lugar es perfecto y se los recomiendo para happy tour, Miguel and Barbara are the best bartender in Aventura
I love this restaurant best happy hour ever , miguel is an amazing mixtolgy.
Thank you Miguel for a great service. Food was amazing and service exceptional. Really nice vibe and would definitely recommend.

My friend and I wanted to give this place a try and def isn’t the last one, we loved this place very clean and cozy, Perfect for  any time and with anyone Miguel the bartender was amazing very friendly gave us great service !!!   Highly recommended we had the ahí tuna tartar (the best I ever had) and the patatas bravas were delicious ....
Fantastic restaurant. Amazing food and drinks. Great service. Highly recommended.
Great cozy place, elegant and delicious food. Excellent service from the bartender B. Ortiz.

(Translated by Google) We loved the atmosphere. The menu is super varied, for all tastes, and dates stuffed with goat cheese made my mouth water. The selection of drinks is also super and I loved knowing that everything is prepared there, even the syrups. It is a different space to share with friends, eat delicious tapas and talk with good music and excellent service. 100% recommended :)  (Original) Nos encantó el ambiente. El menú es súper variado, para todos los gustos, y los dátiles rellenos con queso de cabra me hicieron agua la boca. La selección de tragos también está súper y me encantó saber que todo lo preparan allá, incluso los syrups. Es un espacio diferente para compartir con amigos, comerse unas tapas ricas y conversar con buena música y excelente servicio. 100% recomendado :)
Amazing!!
The perfect place to get together with friends! The food was amazing and the service was great! Finally a trendy and good restaurant in Aventura. I recommend Reunion Kitchn Bar to everyone.

Wow this place is great! Well made drinks, the service was excellent, I would recommend all foods from the menu uff!!! Delicious!!  The ambience of the place is amazing to catch up with friends and also nice place to spend with family. Service was great too!!
